alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 1:18PM PST until December 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 5000 feet. Snowfall up to a foot possible above 8000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Highways 157, 158, and 159 will be impacted.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
